keyMoments.title: Kuzan Freezes Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Kuzan uses his ice powers to freeze Doflamingo and prevent him from killing Smoker, demonstrating his continued commitment to protecting others despite no longer being a Marine.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Kuzan's sense of justice remains intact even after leaving the Marines and hints at his complex motivations.
keyMoments.quote: Even though I'm not enlisted in the Marines anymore, I never fully trusted the World Government and I can still make a difference outside the Marines.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Questions Kuzan
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo questions Kuzan about his current allegiance, referencing rumors about the former Admiral's activities.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows Kuzan's later alliance with the Blackbeard Pirates and creates mystery around his true intentions.

keyMoments.title: Kuzan Explains His Philosophy
keyMoments.description: Kuzan reveals to Smoker that he never fully trusted the World Government and believes he can make a difference outside the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Provides key insight into Kuzan's worldview and motivations for leaving the Marines after losing to Sakazuki.
keyMoments.quote: Even though I'm not enlisted in the Marines anymore, I never fully trusted the World Government and I can still make a difference outside the Marines.

reveals.information: Kuzan never fully trusted the World Government and believes he can still make a difference outside the Marines
Has mysterious activities that Doflamingo has heard rumors about

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Frozen by Kuzan
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo is frozen by Kuzan while attempting to kill Smoker but manages to break free as the ice hadn't reached his heart.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Doflamingo's resilience and power, as well as his pragmatic decision-making in choosing not to fight Kuzan.

keyMoments.title: Questions Kuzan's Allegiance
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo questions what Kuzan stands for, revealing that he has heard rumors about the former Admiral's activities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Doflamingo's extensive intelligence network and hints at future plot developments regarding Kuzan.
keyMoments.quote: What do you stand for now, Kuzan? I've heard some interesting rumors about you.

keyMoments.title: Departs Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo leaves Punk Hazard with Buffalo and Baby 5, acknowledging he needs to change his plans.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Doflamingo's involvement in the Punk Hazard Arc and sets up his return to Dressrosa.

reveals.information: Has heard rumors about Kuzan's mysterious activities after leaving the Marines

keyMoments.title: Bathes with Robin and Nami
keyMoments.description: Momonosuke takes advantage of his child appearance to bathe with Robin and get close to Nami, revealing his perverted nature despite his young age.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Momonosuke's character trait of being perverted like his father, while also showing his clever manipulation skills.
keyMoments.quote: Thank you for saving me, fair princess!

reveals.information: Despite his young age, Momonosuke has a perverted nature and manipulates situations to be close to attractive women

keyMoments.title: Confronts Zoro About Shusui
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon sees that Zoro possesses Shusui and reveals that it is a national treasure of Wano that was buried with the legendary samurai Ryuma. He nearly challenges Zoro to a duel.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the cultural importance of Shusui to Wano and sets up the eventual conflict that leads to Zoro returning the sword.
keyMoments.quote: That sword... That's Ryuma's Shusui! The grave of our greatest samurai was defiled!

reveals.information: Reveals that Shusui is a national treasure of Wano Country and was buried with the legendary samurai Ryuma
Ryuma's grave was defiled when Shusui was stolen

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Reveals Plan to Attack Dressrosa
keyMoments.description: Law reveals the full details of the alliance plan to the Straw Hats, including using Caesar as leverage and the true goal of destroying the SMILE factory to cripple Kaido.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the entire Dressrosa Arc and explains the strategic importance of taking down Doflamingo as part of the plan to eventually take down Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Dressrosa as Next Destination
keyMoments.description: Law explains that they will travel to Dressrosa and meet at Green Bit to exchange Caesar Clown with Doflamingo.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the next arc's location and the immediate plan for the alliance.

reveals.information: The alliance will use Caesar Clown as leverage to negotiate with Doflamingo at Dressrosa, with the true goal being to destroy the SMILE factory
The exchange of Caesar will take place at Green Bit near Dressrosa

keyMoments.title: Saved by Kuzan
keyMoments.description: Smoker's life is saved when Kuzan intervenes and freezes Doflamingo before he can kill him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the bond between former Marine colleagues and sets up Smoker's understanding of Kuzan's current motivations.

keyMoments.title: Learns Kuzan's Philosophy
keyMoments.description: Smoker learns from Kuzan that the former Admiral never fully trusted the World Government and believes he can make a difference outside the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Gives Smoker insight into alternative ways of pursuing justice outside of traditional Marine structures.

keyMoments.title: Breed's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Breed appears as a mysterious figure at the end of the episode, riding on a large sea creature. This is an anime-original character.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the antagonist of the Caesar Retrieval Arc (anime filler). Sets up the next few episodes.

reveals.information: A mysterious individual who rides a large sea creature appears
